thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com | 288 2
thread.title: The C.
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 The C.

author: The C.
title: The C.
text:
I have been burned by GearBest.com in the past and what a nightmare! So one day last year I saw a great sale from banggood.com and so I read thru their wonderful site, and took the chance and bought an item. I am so glad I did they always give you upgrades to 7-12 day shipping for under $1! I always choose it and now over 12 items later I have never had any issues. My products always come to my doorstep on time and safe and sound! They package everything just right to make it to me safely! I will always go to banggood for all my one stop shop needs, without worrying anymore. The service, online chat and constant sales and free upgrades including rewarding the customer with instant saving coupons which last up to 6 months! I cannot be any happier than I am feeling at home with banggood.com! Always a pleasure. Thank you.
The C.
